name: Party Rock
description:
This glitter-palooza is all party no business. This fun mix would look great alone or atop your favorite black, white, or any color in your arsenal.

Nail Polish base is "3-Free". This means they do not contain the Toxic Trio of chemicals: Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate.
The polish also contain cosmetic and other polyester glitters. 

Each MINI bottle is 1/8 oz. (5ml) filled to 7ml

name: Such A Flake
description:
While its name may lead you to believe something different, Such A Flake polish will do nothing less than give you a fabulous, fun, and reliable look.  Such A Flake is a clear based polish with iridescent  pastel  red, blue, gold, green flakes. 

Nail Polish base is "3-Free".  This means they do not contain the Toxic Trio of chemicals: Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate. 

The polish also contains cosmetic mica and synthetic mica.



Each MINI bottle is 1/8 oz. (5ml) filled to 7ml

name: All of The Lights
description:
Turn the lights off and watch it glow. A, fun glow in the dark top coat. 

Nail Polish base is "3-Free".  This means they do not contain the Toxic Trio of chemicals: Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate. 

Each MINI bottle is 1/8 oz. (5ml) filled to 7ml


The polish also contain cosmetic and other polyester glitters, as well as cosmetic-grade pigments.

name: Girl Band
description:
This sheer holographic glitter reminds me of all things “truly outrageous” and one of more popular 80’s Girl Band. This glittery mix looks great by itself or atop another color to create a wonderful synergy! 

Nail Polish base is "3-Free".  This means they do not contain the Toxic Trio of chemicals: Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate. 

The polish also contain cosmetic and other polyester glitters, as well as cosmetic-grade pigments. This polish also contains Aluminum.

Each MINI bottle is 1/8 oz. (5ml) filled to 7ml

name: Fatal
description:
This sparkling vibrant red is a real a killer color! While it won't cause actual death, it will have fashionistas, and make up mavens everywhere virtually dying! 

Nail Polish base is "3-Free". This means they do not contain the Toxic Trio of chemicals: Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate.
The polish also contain cosmetic and other polyester glitters, as well as cosmetic-grade pigments, and mica.
 
Each MINI bottle is 1/8 oz. (5ml) filled to 7ml
